description: List service instances with summary data. This action lists service instances of all services in the Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An array of filtering criteria that scope down the result list. By default, all service instances in the Amazon Web Services account are returned. (dict) --- A filtering criterion to scope down the result list of the  ListServiceInstances action. key (string) --- The name of a filtering criterion. value (string) --- A value to filter by. With the date/time keys ( *At{Before,After}), the value is a valid RFC 3339 string with no UTC offset and with an optional fractional precision (for example, 1985-04-12T23:20:50.52Z).

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The name of a filtering criterion.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A value to filter by. With the date/time keys ( *At{Before,After}), the value is a valid RFC 3339 string with no UTC offset and with an optional fractional precision (for example, 1985-04-12T23:20:50.52Z).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The field that the result list is sorted by. When you choose to sort by serviceName, service instances within each service are sorted by service instance name. Default: serviceName.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Result list sort order. Default: ASCENDING.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates the location of the next service instance in the array of service instances, after the current requested list of service instances.

nested_items.name: serviceInstances
nested_items.description: An array of service instances with summary data.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service instance.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service instance was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A service instance deployment status message.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment that the service instance was deployed into.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment of this service instance.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentAttemptedAt
nested_items.description: The time when a deployment of the service was last attempted.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentSucceededAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service was last deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment of this service instance.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that the service instance belongs to.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The service instance template major version.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The service instance template minor version.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template.
